name: update
description: Updates your application and its dependencies. See https://update.angular.io/
longDescription:
Perform a basic update to the current stable release of the core framework and CLI by running the following command.

```
ng update @angular/cli @angular/core
```

To update to the next beta or pre-release version, use the `--next=true` option.

For detailed information and guidance on updating your application, see the interactive [Angular Update Guide](https://update.angular.io/).

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: packages
options.description: The package or packages to update.

options.name: force
options.description: When false (the default), reports an error if installed packages are incompatible with the update.

options.name: all
options.description: When true, update all packages in `package.json`.

options.name: next
options.description: Update to the latest version, including beta and RCs.

options.name: migrateOnly
options.description: Perform a migration, but do not update the installed version.

options.name: from
options.description: When using `--migrateOnly` for a single package, the version of that package from which to migrate.

options.name: to
options.description: When using `--migrateOnly` for a single package, the version of that package to which to migrate.

options.name: verbose
options.description: When true, display additional details during the update process.

options.name: packageManager
options.description: The preferred package manager configuration files to use for registry settings.
